summary: Jack Reacher is a fictional character and the protagonist of a series of crime thriller novels by British author Lee Child. After leaving the US Army as a major in its military police at age 36, Reacher roams the United States taking odd jobs and investigating suspicious and frequently dangerous situations. As of 5 November 2018, 23 novels have been published, the most recent being Past Tense. The character has also appeared in short stories, and two of the novels have been adapted into successful films, starring Tom Cruise as Reacher.
